name: Prankh
description:
Prankh is a project developed by our students during the 2021/22 academic year for TBO project in collaboration with AvantGarden Games.

PrAnkh is a detective game, with procedural elements, set in Ancient Egypt. You are a pharaoh mummy that wakes up and discovers that he has been killed by someone in his court.

Investigate your death and discover the funny mysteries of your pharaoh court in PrAnkh. Explore your mansion, speak with your underlings, solve riddles and find all the culprits in this crazy investigation game.

Once you have been found guilty you can finally die and…Wait. You revive again?!

PC Controls:

- Press WASD to move the character
- Press Shift and WASD to run
- Press E to interact
- Press M to open the Map
- Press I to open the inventory
- Press H to open the Hints
- Press P to open the Mind Palace
- Use the mouse to interact with the UI
